definition: to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)

sentences.english: Click on the little eye icon on the left hand side of the ‘Background’ layer so it makes this particular layer invisible.
sentences.chinese: 单击背景图层左边的眼睛图标，这样能使它不可见。

sentences.english: Right-click the project, and launch the properties dialog.
sentences.chinese: 右键单击工程，启动属性对话框。

sentences.english: Right-click on the managed system you want to enter the validation code for.
sentences.chinese: 右键单击您想要为其输入验证代码的所管理系统。

sentences.english: A check box is toggled by pressing the spacebar.
sentences.chinese: 一个复选框可通过单击空档键进行切换。

sentences.english: When I click another tab, the content literally glides to it.
sentences.chinese: 当我单击另一个选项卡时，内容便逐字地向其滑动。

sentences.english: The mouse moves the pointer or cursor on the computer screen.
sentences.chinese: 将光标放在要添加新图框的位置，然后单击鼠标。

sentences.english: Then click OK to set the environment variable.
sentences.chinese: 然后单击“确定”，以设置此环境变量。

sentences.english: Click the forward button, located by the start button.
sentences.chinese: 单击位于开始按钮旁边的前进按钮。

sentences.english: Click on the current sorting icon.
Rescheduling could be done primarily through a new point-and-click interface.
sentences.chinese: 修改计划基本上能通过新的单击界面完成。

sentences.english: Wait a few minutes, and then click the Redial button.
sentences.chinese: 等待几分钟后单击“重拨”按钮。

sentences.english: Right-click the domain controller, and then click Delete .
sentences.chinese: 右键单击域控制器，然后单击“删除”。

sentences.english: Right-click the domain controller, and then click Delete .
sentences.chinese: 右键单击域控制器，然后单击“删除”。

sentences.english: Clicking a cell or a row header selects the full row.
sentences.chinese: 单击单元格或行标题可以选择整行。

sentences.english: Invoke the file from a command line, or click it depending on your operating system. The script putters around for a while before outputting something like this
sentences.chinese: 从命令行调用文件，或者根据操作系统单击文件。

sentences.english: Click to add a custom menu or submenu.
sentences.chinese: 单击此处可添加自定义菜单或子菜单。

definition: to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
